item.title: Architecture and Vision
item.description: Vision Aurora aims to unify the best of both worlds open-source and proprietary Kubernetes environments, offering a standardized, scalable, and secure hosting solution.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Aurora is a secure, cloud-native application hosting platform built by departments for departments across the Government of Canada.

item.title: Contact us
item.description: How to get involved with our community Join our growing community to collaborate with like-minded professionals, and help shape the platform.

item.title: Get involved
item.description: At GC Cloud One: Aurora, we’re building a collaborative community around cloud-native technologies, and we encourage everyone to get involved!

item.title: Rules of Engagement
item.description: Purpose The Aurora initiative is a collaborative effort that brings together diverse stakeholders across the Government of Canada.

item.title: Strategic Proposal
item.description: Project overview Aurora represents the possible future state of a unified application hosting platform for the Government of Canada (GC).
